sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form @submit.prevent="submit">
    <input v-model="name" placeholder="Product name" required />
    <input v-model.number="price" type="number" placeholder="Price" required />
    <button type="submit">Add Product</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return { name: '', price: 0 };
  },
  methods: {
    submit() {
      this.$emit('add-product', { name: this.name, price: this.price });
      this.name = '';
      this.price = 0;
    },
  },
};
</script>
